ygData.subject: Re: Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually this is Blizzard and believe me content is what they are about look at the last game they made Starcraft great game played it for 20days of playing
ygData.messageBody:
Actually this is Blizzard and believe me content is what they are about look
at the last game they made Starcraft great game played it for 20days of
playing time.

Conaldar
Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Sharon Mock <sharon@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 1:57 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest


>From: "Sharon Mock" <sharon@...>
>
>Yes, and I know for a fact that Diablo 2 will be horrible, because it's
>published by Cendant, and they have so little soul that they cook their
>books.
>
>Blizzard, you say? Who cares who DEVELOPS the game? What matters is who
>PUBLISHES it, because everybody knows it's the publisher who's responsible
>for the content.
>
>Ahem... anyway...
>
>I like Asheron's Call in many ways, but I haven't played it for quite a
>while. IMO Turbine's designed the more interesting world, but Verant's
>designed the more playable game.
>
>Oh, and (straying back onto topic, vaguely) Asheron's Call won't have
bards,
>at least not for initial release, which probably means not ever.
>
> -- Sharon
>
>----------
>>From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>
>>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest
>>Date: Fri, Jul 16, 1999, 7:41 AM
>>
>
>>From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>
>>
>>
>>Many of my friends were trying to tell me how good
>>Ashrons Call was going to be when it came out. But I
>>only had to see one name on the package to know this
>>would not be, for you see, my friends
>>
>>MICROSOFT HAS NO SOUL
>>
